questionText: What is philosophy often defined as?

answerOptions.answerText: A. All rational inquiry except for science
B. The study of metaphysics
C. The exploration of ethics
D. The investigation of epistemology

questionText: What are some metaphysical issues that philosophers ponder?

answerOptions.answerText: A. The existence of God and the nature of human free will
B. The laws of nature and morality
C. The number of dimensions in the world
D. The existence of other minds
A. The nature of knowledge and justified belief
B. The nature of reality
C. The exploration of ethics
D. The existence of God
A. What we ought to do, how we should live, and how we should organize our communities
B. The laws of nature and morality
C. The nature of knowledge and justified belief
D. The existence of other minds

questionText: What is the value of philosophy?

answerOptions.answerText: A. To broaden our understanding and free us from narrow-minded thinking
B. To provide definite answers to all philosophical questions
C. To challenge societal and religious commands
D. To stimulate wonder and promote intellectual growth
